quote: The fake people are worried about their reputation. The real people are worried about their character.
Hard work is necessary, but hard work alone is not enough.
If you don't like your destiny, don't accept it. Instead, have the courage to change it the way you want it to be.
It's not the face that makes someone a monster, it's the choices they make with their lives.
People die when they are killed.
Even if I die, you keep living okay? Live to see what becomes of the future.
When you have something you want to protect, you become truly strong.
The world isn't perfect. But it's there for us doing the best it can. That's what makes it so damn beautiful.
Being alone is better than being with the wrong person.
